Origins: In August 2015, a fake news story claiming action star Steven Seagal had passed away from a "massive heart attack" started circulating online.
Description: The reports of Seagal's death are nothing but another celebrity death hoax, however. The actor is alive and well, just having undertaken a trip to Russia and having signed on to star in the action thriller End of a Gun . Steven Seagal has been killed off multiple times in the land of hoaxes, most prominently via a fake "R.I.P. Steven Seagal" Facebook page established in May 2013.
Example: [Collected via email, August 2015] Did Steven Seagal die of a massive heart attack?
Claim: Steven Seagal died of a heart attack at age 63 in August 2015.
